https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-24-.title: Atkinsons 24 Old Bond Street EDC 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-24-.description: Created by prolific and highly regarded perfumer Christine Nagel alongside nose Violaine Collas, 24 Old Bond Street takes its name from the address that Atkinsons relocated to in 1832 following the resounding success of their original fragrance. Commisioned to mark the 200th anniversary of the company, 24 Old Bond Street is an English eau de cologne of great character and sophistication. Opening with a combination of plump juniper berries and lightly spicy cardamom in the top notes, the heart of the fragrance brings the rich aroma of whiskey to the fore, shot through with the sweet floral scent of rose. In the base, precious ambergris is combined with dark black tea and robust cedar against a backdrop of classic musk to produce a mellow and sultry finish that is the ideal complement for evening wear.

https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-24-.title: Atkinsons 24 Old Triple Extract EDC 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-24-.description: Atkinsons 24 Old Bond Street Triple Extract is a new eau de cologne by Atkinsons which celebrates 200 years of the house. This fragrance is not the only one which celebrates this important anniversary but was launched after trilogy The Contemporary Collection which represents fashion interpretations of the three classic perfume ingredients (rose, green notes and lavender) with fragrances Rose in Wonderland, Posh on the Green and Lavender on the Rocks. 24 Old Bond Street as the fragrant symbol of the house is a typical English eau de cologne with strong character, while the new 24 Old Bond Street Triple Extract is a highly concentrated version of the basic English cologne. Re-edition of the contemporary EDC 24 Old Bond Street is available in a collection of five fragrance presented in 2013. Composition of the perfume provides juniper berries combined with cardamom in top notes. It is followed by rose aromatized with whiskey, on a base of ambergris, musk, black tea and cedar. Cocktail of aromas of juniper, rose and black tea owes particular beauty to woody shades of whiskey providing special smoky charm of oak barrels.

https://www.karjistore.com/black-saffron.title: Black Saffron By Byredo EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/black-saffron.description: Often associated to fire, Saffron is considered as the most auspicious colour in India. The monks and sages of Hinduism wear Saffron clothes as a symbol of abstinence from all the material things, thoughts and pleasures. It has always been a part of BYREDO's founder Indian upbringing both in smell, taste and colour. The fragrance is inspired by this idea of unity and inclusion.

https://www.karjistore.com/oud-immortel-.title: Oud Immortel By Byredo EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/oud-immortel-.description: The duo Oud Immortel and Accord Oud are both created around oud, a certain type of wood that because of its use in traditional incense and perfume, has gained great cultural significance and has gotten its existence recorded in one of the world's oldest written texts - the Sanskrit Vedas from India. When the once light heartwood from the Aquilaria tree becomes infected with a specific type of mold, it defends itself by saturating its core with a dark, highly fragrant, resin. This dark wood, oud or agarwood holds a complex fragrance, resembling few or no other natural ingredients.

https://www.karjistore.com/burberry-my-b.title: Burberry My Burberry EDP For Women
https://www.karjistore.com/burberry-my-b.description: My Burberry Perfume by Burberry, With the resplendent bouquet of fruit and flowers, my burberry for women takes you from day to evening with grace and sophistication. Lovely notes of sweet pea, geranium, freesia and rose entwine with the essence of bergamot to create an unforgettably fresh scent. Introduced in 2014, this striking fragrance from burberry lets you express your unique femininity and features layers of depth and intensity.

https://www.karjistore.com/my-burberry-b.title: My Burberry Blush EDP 90ml
https://www.karjistore.com/my-burberry-b.description: My Burberry Blush, a fruity floral eau de perfume with a sparkling twist. Stepping back into a London garden awakening in the first light of day, my Burberry blush captures the senses as blossoming flowers pop with spirited energy. Created by perfumer Francis kurkdjian and Christopher bailey, the fragrance opens with glazed pomegranate and vibrant lemon. Delicate rose petal notes are lifted with crisp apple, while a base of jasmine and wisteria round off the scent for an intensely feminine touch. The bottle is enlivened with a feminine and sophisticated pink hue, reflecting the confident and spirited character of the fragrance. This alternative, nonconformist, almost irreverent brand immediately carved out a niche of its own. https://www.karjistore.com/police-men-s-.title: Police Men's Leather Bracelet P PJ.25488BLB/01-SPE
https://www.karjistore.com/police-men-s-.description: Police - the De Rigo Group's house brand, was launched in Italy in 1983 as unisex eyewear and a metropolitan manifesto for those who set out to get noticed. The name is no coincidence. It triggers the imagination and dreams, especially of the younger generations, and offers a whole new outlook, across the ocean and against the tide. The name evokes the American "on the road" lifestyle, but also the strong urban spirit of the city of all cities: New York. The Police attitude made its worldwide mark right from the outset, as an Italian brand with potent international overtones. This alternative, nonconformist, almost irreverent brand immediately carved out a niche of its own. Building on its growing identity and positioning, over the years Police has reinvented itself, going from a simple eyewear brand to a veritable lifestyle benchmark. In this transformation, the brand extended to include a full range of fashion accessories - perfumes, watches, jewellery and leather goods - all with a strong personality.

https://www.karjistore.com/police-collon.description: Police - the De Rigo Group's house brand, was launched in Italy in 1983 as unisex eyewear and a metropolitan manifesto for those who set out to get noticed. The name evokes the American "on the road" lifestyle, but also the strong urban spirit of the city of all cities: New York. The Police attitude made its worldwide mark right from the outset, as an Italian brand with potent international overtones. This alternative, nonconformist, almost irreverent brand immediately carved out a niche of its own. Building on its growing identity and positioning, over the years Police has reinvented itself, going from a simple eyewear brand to a veritable lifestyle benchmark. https://www.karjistore.com/police-gents-.title: Police Gents Raho Black Dial Watch PEWJG2227412
https://www.karjistore.com/police-gents-.description: Police - the De Rigo Group's house brand, was launched in Italy in 1983 as unisex eyewear and a metropolitan manifesto for those who set out to get noticed. The name is no coincidence. It triggers the imagination and dreams, especially of the younger generations, and offers a whole new outlook, across the ocean and against the tide. The name evokes the American "on the road" lifestyle, but also the strong urban spirit of the city of all cities: New York. The Police attitude made its worldwide mark right from the outset, as an Italian brand with potent international overtones. This alternative, nonconformist, almost irreverent brand immediately carved out a niche of its own. Building on its growing identity and positioning, over the years Police has reinvented itself, going from a simple eyewear brand to a veritable lifestyle benchmark. In this transformation, the brand extended to include a full range of fashion accessories - perfumes, watches, jewellery and leather goods - all with a strong personality.

https://www.karjistore.com/bdk-bouquet-d.title: BDK Bouquet De Hongrie EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/bdk-bouquet-d.description: She's getting ready. It's a beautiful day. The sky is blue. She puts her naked foot on the floor and like a dancer, travels the distance of the mirrored hallway to the dressing table. It's one of her favorite spots. She likes getting pretty there. There are only flowers from the garden, and both her hands, fresh and clean, which seem to spin around them. Her right hand, agile and light, grabs her powder, then a bottle of perfume. Her left-hand clutches eye shadow and nude lipstick. She then moves on to the closet, where she picks a light dress and fixes a rebel strap. She slides on pair of heels and fastens a belt around her waist. Just like every morning, she walks towards her balcony full of flowers. Its on the 4th floor and overlooks the gardens of Palais Royal. She is happy and thinks of her day ahead, smiling.

https://www.karjistore.com/bdk-pas-ce-so.title: BDK Pas Ce Soir EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/bdk-pas-ce-so.description: Just like every night, Madam is getting ready in her office. She wont have time to go back home. She freshens up, touches her make-up: red velour lipstick sometimes Bordeaux depending on her mood. She brushes her hair and takes out her necklace from her purse. Her white shirt slightly open highlights her inviting curves. She adds a bit more black to her eyes. She slams the front door as her heels strides on the sidewalk. Just like every Thursdays, shes going to the cabaret Place de la Concorde. Madam has high hopes like every night. She likes people; she loves life. She finds a stool at the bar and orders a whiskey with ice before lighting her cigarette. In the darkness, she makes out a silhouette in front of her. She turns to the side. Its him. Its always him. Their path often cross but they never speak. She smiles, gets up and goes dancing. Alone. Men line up for her attention, she politely replies. Madam is chic, she responds. Close to 2am while a dandy looking men catches her eyes and invites her to dance. She abides but only for a short period, she leans in says she has to go home. She likes him but the morning is soon approaching. She leaves after whispering these words in his ears...  Not tonight.

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Distalitol7 Room Spray 500ml

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Biancofiore Room Spray 500ml

https://www.karjistore.com/gisada-ambass.title: Gisada Ambassadora For Women EDP
https://www.karjistore.com/gisada-ambass.description: The fruity sweetness meets luxuriously soft notes. A fragrant duet is formed by Tangerine and Blueberry in the top note of the perfume. Jasmine and Orange Blossom bring their very own rich fruitiness in to the Parfume. Vanilla, Musk and Sandalwood underline the whole, with their comforting warmth smell. Cashmere Wood and Powdered Sugar add a delicate finish to the accords with their extravagance. Pink pepper provides the subliminal wow effect.

https://www.karjistore.com/maison-rebatc.title: Maison Rebatchi Rose Rebatchi EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/maison-rebatc.description: The strong bond that links Randa Hammami and Mohamed Rebatchi led to the creation of “Rose Rebatchi”, an exercise in delicate style around rose, the symbol of the Maison. A secret westernized yet oriental rose, a fragrance where tenderness and sophistication blossom in the purest state possible.Randa Hammami - "Damask rose essence and Turkish rose absolute are beautifully enveloped in powdery iris and white musks, and gently intertwined with velvety notes of peach, crisp apple, spicy pink pepper and saffron, known as "red gold". White musks mingle with drydown notes that are warm and woody (sandalwood, ambergris) and vibrant cedar wood."

https://www.karjistore.com/maison-rebatc.title: Maison Rebatchi Feu Patchouli EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/maison-rebatc.description: A small sensual and dazzling gem that is fiery, spicy, and soft, yet never fades. Brimming with energy.Bertrand Duchaufour - "A powerful woody blend with scents of chypre and dominant patchouli. A magnificent and vibrant symphony in which spices clove, cinnamon, black pepper, pink pepper ring like electrifying brass. The fragrance is rich, dense, intense, dark and mysterious as well as intoxicating."

https://www.karjistore.com/maison-rebatc.title: Maison Rebatchi Musc Panache EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/maison-rebatc.description: An intimate musk that the perfumer could almost have created for himself.Maurice Roucel - "Far from excessive eroticism, this fragrance nonetheless boasts a sensual signature. Concealed under the contours of a spicy cologne, I wanted to reveal an iris heart delicately placed on an overabundance of musks, bringing roundness. Finally, a rather transparent woody base of vetiver and cedar blends together with an amber note of vanilla and tonka bean."

https://www.karjistore.com/maison-rebatc.title: Maison Rebatchi Cuir Tassili EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/maison-rebatc.description: A tribute to the origins of Mohamed Rebatchi, inspired by a journey through the Tassili desert.Aliénor Massenet - "To pay tribute to the origins of Mohamed Rebatchi I drew inspiration from my journey through the Tassili desert in southeast Algeria, the traditional region of the Tuareg Ajjer or Tuareg people of the West, and the olfactory sensations I experienced. Waking up in the morning after a night sleeping in a tent, I could smell the tea brewing and cherbet Algerian lemonade, as well as the leather of the camels’ saddles. A true invitation to travel."

https://www.karjistore.com/maison-rebatc.title: Maison Rebatchi Jasmin Satin EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/maison-rebatc.description: Evoking Mohamed Rebatchi's memories of Mediterranean summers, Jasmin Satin offers a taste of the essence of joy: a feast for the senses as intense as it is subtle.Karine Dubreuil - Jasmin Satin is a figurative exercise interplaying two varieties of jasmine from India and Egypt. Like painters blending colors, Mohamed and I mixed together our most fabulous memories of the Mediterranean to create this fragrance. The two jasmines have a very delicate nocturnal freshness that comes to life with the touch of VOIUPtUOUS gardenia and wood. To us, Jasmin Satin evokes that magic moment when the blue of the sea sparkles and shines, penetrating the shade of the great cedars in an explosion of scents.

https://www.karjistore.com/michael-kors-.title: Michael Kors Women's Lauryn Stainless-steel Watch
https://www.karjistore.com/michael-kors-.description: Establish in the 1980s, American luxury fashion brand Michael Kors shot to international fame in the mid-2000s thanks to its glamourous line of accessories. Michael Kors watches are a must-buy for anyone with an eye for what they wear. Whether it's bought as a gift or a personal treat, you'll fall in love with your Michael Kors watch the instant it's on your wrist. Ladies rose gold metallic designs are one of the most popular on the market, followed be classic gold designs. These soft and delicate timepieces are ideal day-to-night wear, often accompanied with white leather accents and glowing stones around the face. More extravagant designs in yellow gold and silver make for head-turning accessories, ideal for a formal occasion. Men's watches are available in bright metallic along with dark leather, which makes for a stylish addition to a smart suit, or even semi-casual evening wear. Michael Kors is an American fashion giant specialising in dressing the jet-set with their unique brand of contemporary cool. Their sophisticated watch collection has been created with the fashion savvy in mind and includes a number of stunning designs. Bestselling Michael Kors watches for women are finished in classic gold, sleek silver or gorgeous rose gold, and include bold oversized styles, right down to dainty, classic designs featuring Roman numerals. The men's range is equally as desirable with understated classic looks featuring beautiful brown leather straps, and off-gold watches featuring intricate detailing and champagne dials.

https://www.karjistore.com/gisada-uomo-e.title: Gisada Uomo EDT
https://www.karjistore.com/gisada-uomo-e.description: Elegant, stylish and self-confident - Uomo by Gisada was created for men who want to emphasize their strong character with sensuality and individuality. https://www.karjistore.com/floris-cherry.title: Floris Cherry Blossom Hair Mist 50ml
https://www.karjistore.com/floris-cherry.description: A beautiful addition to the original Eau de Parfum, Cherry Blossom takes inspiration from the centuries-old tradition of "Hanami" in Japan, Friends and family would picnic under  Sakura trees to relax and appreciate the stunning view of cherry blossom "clouds", which their delicate scents lingered on the breeze. The Cherry Blossom Hair Mist will ensure that the delicate soft floral scent of this uplifting bloom radiates and envelops you for the whole day. Formulated with Panthenol Pro-Vitamin B5 to help condition and nourish the hair, this gentle fragrant mist also contains a selection of beneficial ingredients selected to leave your hair looking shiny and feeling wonderfully soft.

https://www.karjistore.com/paradis-des-s.title: Paradis Des Sens Nirvana EDP 100ml

An opening of spicy rich notes blended with fruity oaky notes and woody undertones that will give you the most sophisticated feel. Mixed with Cinnamon and Tonka Beans. https://www.karjistore.com/floris-platin.title: Floris Platinum 22 EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/floris-platin.description: Opening with top notes of cool orris, rounded by the comforting scent of oats, and lifted with a sparkle of blackcurrant and lime, Platinum 22 gently yields to the radiant heart notes of rich rose with violet leaves, clary sage, black tea, and a touch of black pepper to add a hint of spice. The fragrance then concludes with the warm woody base note of cedarwood enriched by a harmony of smooth amber, musk and tonka bean.

https://www.karjistore.com/floris-no-007.title: Floris No.007 EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/floris-no-007.description: Created in celebration of the James Bond film franchiseï¿s special anniversary, 60 years since the release of Dr No, in 1962.This exclusive fragrance is fondly distilled from 60 incredible years of 007 on the silver screen. No. 007 naturally draws inspiration from the effortless style and substance of the legendary man himself, as well as being developed from carefully gleaning the spectacular cinematic experience of the exotic locations featured in the films, coupled with the diverse and truly exceptional cultural influence that the Bond films have inspired over generations.A rich and spicy fragrance with amber at its base, this captivating scent is a blend of refreshing citrus and juniper notes set against a subtly smoky accord with flashes of spicy dianthus carnation and an aromatic heart created by a fusion of rose, lavender, rosemary, and geranium, underscored by the reassuring warmth of sensual amber, sandalwood, oakmoss and musk.

https://www.karjistore.com/floris-mulber.title: Floris Mulberry Fig EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/floris-mulber.description: Mulberry Fig is a scent that evokes a floral amber fragrance combining the soft powdery character of orris with hints of fruit and spice. The perfume opens with a sparkle of fig and cardamom supported from the heart with fragrant green tones of vetiver and cypress. Amyris, cedarwood and sandalwood emphasise the overall woody character that permeates through the perfume.A quick promenade away from our Jermyn Street shop lies Saint Jamesï¿s, one of Londonï¿s oldest Royal Parks, surrounded by some of the countryï¿s most famous landmarks and lush greenery. Creamy sweet and bitter green aromas encompass the shoreline of the blissful lake towered by an abundance of fig trees, immense in scale with elongated deciduous leaves flaunting their architectural foliage, believed to be the largest in Britain.

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Nun EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.description: By this palindrome word, the Ancient Egyptian meant the primordial water, in other words the God Nun. According to the legend, this water gave birth to the Lotus, a flower which was used to hide into the water during the night, to open up again at the sunshine. While blossoming out the flower revealed the Sun God Atum. Hence the symbolism of the Sun God, of rebirth.This fragrance arises from the Nun and opens up at the sunshine, while its scented molecules spread out into the air. Itï¿s a tribute to this iconic, symbolic flower.The fragrance opens with evident citrus notes, in which pear reveals its sweetness joining a heart of blossoming lotus, jasmine and ylang ylang. Woods, amber and musk play the end notes of this scented accord.

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Decou-Vert EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.description: Decou-Vert is born to fulfill the goal to gather three different types of fragrances, often considered at odds: flowery notes, those genuinely vegetables and the so-called green. A blind frame lift us to a brand new experience, in which we could feel the colors and perceive a hint of a sultry Magnolia carried by the rustle of green leaves.We were enormously amazed when we realized how the unusual combination led to a watery scent.Look beyond the leaves, the sharp vegetation: it appears to be green all over. Decou-Vert is released into the air and the green surrenders to a variety of colors, a lively and vibrant palette of flowers and leaves. Light notes flirt with bright notes evoking an original kaleidoscope. Breathtaking. The base notes bring peace back, thanks to the intriguing musky and woody notes. Decou-Vert is the astonishment coming from the hazardous meeting of an oasis in the middle of the forest. An olfactive surprise.

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Tokande EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.description: "And the ones who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music." Friedrich NietzscheTonkade, the new fragrance of the Laboratorio in Nero collection, was created on the basis of an imaginary dance, a sensual ritual that alternates sweetness and mystery. Ingredients that, just like the sinuous movements of dancers, appear, twirl and then disappear, giving rise to a choral performance that remains engraved in the heart and mind.The fragrance, which is revealed as soon as the bottle is opened, features the floral notes of Neroli, the spicy notes of Cardamom and the soft notes of the Tonka Bean. A warm heart of Cedar, Vanilla and Patchouli announces a background characterised by dry amber woods that, combined once again with the coils of the Tonka Bean, make this fragrance intriguing and mysterious. Itï¿s addictiveï¿

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Vanagloria EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.description: For the Masterï¿s Collection, I wanted to create a perfume that expresses all the richness of Vanilla and its multiple facets. This creation is built around an LMR Vanilla bean of sublime quality, of which I have amplified the most subtle tones. This Bourbon Vanilla, grown in the heart of the Indian Ocean, is extracted using CO2, a cold extraction technique that reveals the full spectrum of its gourmand, floral, leathery and spicy notes. Its leathery character is reinforced by saffron and its addictiveness by the tonka bean, while the enveloping layers of incense add the texture of a mystical aura. Dominique Ropion

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Exploud EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.description: "ExpLOud marks the beginning of a new creative synergy: Laboratorio Olfattivo meets Pierre Guï¿ros, perfumer at Symrise. This great traveller and connoisseur of Middle East immediately seduced us with his sensitivity, his human curiosity and his ability to establish an empathic contact with other cultures. Without hesitation, we entrusted him the mission of giving body to "our vision" of Oud. ExpLOud was born, as an aromatic explosion based on the most precious and luminous of Ouds, with floral notes to lift and twist the characteristic scent of this unique raw material which has already experienced numerous interpretations on the market".

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Nektar EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.description: "When I received the first samples of the fragrance that would later become Nektar, I was ravished by its personality and by the quality of its composition. Full of softness and creativity, Nektar recalls honey without being overwhelming, while drawing a distinctive character from its intense notes.Working with Pierre was a real pleasure. In little time, we gave life to a perfume that does not go unnoticed, now available in our flagship stores and at authorized retailers across the globe."

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Rosamunda EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.description: Elegant in the sunlight, passionate when the night comes down. A Rose difficult to be imprisoned in just one definition. Provocative and carnal like the Roses on the hair of the feminine characters of Gabriel Garï¿ia Marquez but, at the same time, sumptuous, wrapped in a neoclassical brightness.A large quantity of Bulgarian and Turkish Roses and long hours of distillation to get this creation: the seductive power of the Rose is  brought to fever pitch and its being classic is corrupted with Patchouli. Around this beating heart, illuminated by green lymph of rose, a scented scenario of golden spices, ancient woods and animal notes with an aphrodisiac imprint.  An impalpable landscape unknown to the eyes and to the nose,  a Rose worthy of adoration for which a celebratory altar was built, an altar covered by Oud, from which an essence with an immortal appeal  is extracted.

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Nun Hair Mist 50ml
https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.description: A symbol of change and strength, hair has always been an instrument of beauty and sensuality. For us, it was essential that we created a product that could both enhance this very important weapon of seduction as well as make it smell great. Aromatic veils envelope the hair, thanks to the spray bottle that gently deposits the product over the tresses. It contains the following active ingredients: alcohol of natural origin, which is extracted from molasses or wheat, whose presence in the formula guarantees a dry and silky touch; conditioning agents that, creating a protective film, envelope the hair, leaving it flowing and easy to comb. Its invisible formula envelopes the hair with a delicate fragrance and enhances it without weighing it down, leaving it soft and silky. Thanks to the practical and elegant portable bottle, Hair Mist will become the sensual and discreet way to emphasize your femininity that you canï¿t live without.

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Bergamotto EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.description: The Master Perfumer Jean-Claude Ellena, inspired by his love for Italy, has created a collection of Parfum Cologne, that are portraits of Italian happiness. Mandarino, Limone and Bergamotto are the fragrances of the collection ï¿Viaggio in Italiaï¿, a journey to Italy, fragrances that are like sunshine in winter."Although citrus fruits originate from China, Bergamot is Italian. It is a pity that nobody knows who created it by crossing a lemon tree with a bitter orange: this inventor might have been honoured in the same way as the colleague Clï¿ment, who invented the clementine. Italian traders managed to sell Bergamot to the Chinese Market to add fragrance to their second-rate tea, which they sold back to the English Market. I am often asked whether I have olfactory preferences. I have always said I do not, wishing to conceal the manipulations I perform on fragrances, as the work of a perfumer is always that of an illusionist. Yes, I have preferences and they vary according to my needs, my desires. I have passing loves, as well as solid, perennial loves, among which there is my love for bergamot. It was time for me to make that official". Jean-Claude Ellena

https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-24-.title: Atkinsons 24 Old Bond Street EDC 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-24-.description: Created by prolific and highly regarded perfumer Christine Nagel alongside nose Violaine Collas, 24 Old Bond Street takes its name from the address that Atkinsons relocated to in 1832 following the resounding success of their original fragrance. Commisioned to mark the 200th anniversary of the company, 24 Old Bond Street is an English eau de cologne of great character and sophistication. Opening with a combination of plump juniper berries and lightly spicy cardamom in the top notes, the heart of the fragrance brings the rich aroma of whiskey to the fore, shot through with the sweet floral scent of rose. In the base, precious ambergris is combined with dark black tea and robust cedar against a backdrop of classic musk to produce a mellow and sultry finish that is the ideal complement for evening wear.

https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-24-.title: Atkinsons 24 Old Triple Extract EDC 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-24-.description: Atkinsons 24 Old Bond Street Triple Extract is a new eau de cologne by Atkinsons which celebrates 200 years of the house. This fragrance is not the only one which celebrates this important anniversary but was launched after trilogy The Contemporary Collection which represents fashion interpretations of the three classic perfume ingredients (rose, green notes and lavender) with fragrances Rose in Wonderland, Posh on the Green and Lavender on the Rocks. 24 Old Bond Street as the fragrant symbol of the house is a typical English eau de cologne with strong character, while the new 24 Old Bond Street Triple Extract is a highly concentrated version of the basic English cologne. Re-edition of the contemporary EDC 24 Old Bond Street is available in a collection of five fragrance presented in 2013. Composition of the perfume provides juniper berries combined with cardamom in top notes. It is followed by rose aromatized with whiskey, on a base of ambergris, musk, black tea and cedar. Cocktail of aromas of juniper, rose and black tea owes particular beauty to woody shades of whiskey providing special smoky charm of oak barrels.

	fragrance inside and its confident and sensual nature. The outer design features raised Burberry lettering at the base.

https://www.karjistore.com/histoires-thi.title: Histoires De Parfums This Is Not A Blue Bottle 1.6 EDP 60ml
https://www.karjistore.com/histoires-thi.description: Green souls fall in love in the shade of Citrus trees. Your laughter exhales a song of Yuzu zests and my kisses flutter, white, like petals of Neroli – as they rest on your Grapefruit lips. Red. The pulp of my fingers run along your Jasmine neck, I drink the blue seas of your eyes and the smell of your smiles. There is a heat, a whiff of Vanilla, of two bodies entwined in a shape of White Musks. Hypnotic Lotus and dilated pupils, there comes from my fingers like a moan of Geranium, a desire to taste you like a sip of Orange juice. Green. I waft towards you on the wings of your skin-of-clouds. “Words do not lie”. There is no end to me. This is not a blue bottle derives its name from “The Treachery of Images”, a famous work in the 1920s by the Belgian surrealist painter René Magritte. The painting shows the image of a pipe above a declaration which reads, translated from French, as “This is not a pipe”. In between the line where things go from void to existence, there is a profound depth of possibility. This is not a blue bottle is the allegory of a fragrant big bang, a journey from the abstract to the most fiery of emotions in the infinite realm of blue.

Sovereign radiance, endless wonder, a sunbeam soft as a kiss of Sandalwood and White Musk. Ardent emotion of a Vanilla-ethereal warmth that caresses. https://www.karjistore.com/teatro-tobacc.description: Tabacco 1815 celebrates the excellence of the Tuscan Cigar. In 1815 a large quantity of tobacco, which was left to dry in the sun at the Florentine Factory by the river, was hit by a sudden and violent rain. In order not to “throw it down the river Arno”, it was decided to produce cigars for the people of Florence out of this amount of tobacco leaves. Tabacco 1815 is the scent of a tradition born by chance that already celebrates more than 200 years of existence. https://www.karjistore.com/moresque-divi.title: Moresque Divina Marchesa EDP 50ml
https://www.karjistore.com/moresque-divi.description: It is a perfume of extreme contrasts, inspired by the eccentric and non-conformist Marquise Luisa Casati Stampa, who was a provocative and refined icon; in it, a note of Lavender loses its relaxed tones to reveal its more electric, nocturnal and seductive side. Modern and irreverent, Lavender runs through the fragrance in a game of fresh, stimulating and deep contrasts. Enhanced by a spicy and aromatic infusion, sublimed by the notes of Jasmine, Rose and Iris, made mysterious by Patchouli and Vetiver on a trail of Incense, it emerges dazzlingly in the warmth of Sandalwood and Amber, to become pure seduction, trapped in a warm, rich and earthy base.It is a sexy and intriguing Lavender with a sillage that is over the top, just like the provocative Divine Marquise herself. A panther that loves the night and its beautiful people, of whom she is the unrivalled and mysterious mistress.

https://www.karjistore.com/moresque-byro.title: Moresque Byron EDP 50ml
https://www.karjistore.com/moresque-byro.description: Pale-skinned with his curls swept by the winds of passion, his gaze lost in the infinite horizon and wearing a soft open-collared shirt. The tall dark stranger with his brooding looks arrives in Venice on a dark and stormy night in 1816. He loves the melancholic gaiety of the gondolas and the silence of the canals. The splendour of the palaces and the extravagant, timeless atmosphere which light up the imagination and the senses to the core. He is intrigued by that radiant Mediterranean beauty which is mixed with incandescent scents of the Orient. Sensual, refined, mysterious and unforgettable Byron.The Mediterranean aura of Tangerine shines, in the fullness of its beauty, amongst the piquant scents of Pink Pepper and Ginger and luminous touches of Bergamot and Lemon. A romantic heart of Magnolia entwined with petals of Jasmine and Taif Rose, infused with Saffron and Cardamom, seduces. And it lets itself go, amongst intriguing whirls of Sandalwood and Cedar, veined by the darkness of Patchouli, in an incandescent embrace of Amber and Cypriol. A wisp of Vanilla elevates desire and Musk exalts an infinite attraction.

https://www.karjistore.com/moresque-tami.title: Moresque Tamima Sillage 75ml

Even before her voice or her eyes, her fragrance, like a spell, enters without knocking and penetrates every nook and cranny with its intoxicating scents. Her fragrance can be perceived before she arrives and it lingers on, enveloping and irresistible, for long after she has left. A sumptuous and sensual fragrance, where a floral heart of Neroli and Iris is made intriguing by an unusual note of Mugwort, to fade out amid the bois  accords of Cashmere Wood and Agar, smoothed by resins and enveloped by Vanilla, creating a persistent and sophisticated fragrance. https://www.karjistore.com/scentologia-o.title: Scentologia Obsidian Extrait De Parfum 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/scentologia-o.description: Growing up in the South of France, Theo Belmas developed a love for arts and fashion early on. Surrounded by roses, travel, and music, he channeled these experiences into perfumery. He gained high levels of expertise, including a bachelor's degree in molecular chemistry, a master's degree in perfumery, and an apprenticeship at Grasse. Belmas joined Symrise in 2019, where he now focuses on creativity, technique, and sustainability in fragrances. Partnering with Thomas Obroki, a perfumer at Symrise, they crafted the warm, floral Extrait de Parfum, Obsidian.An addition to our continuously expanding fragrances is Obsidian. This Extrait de Parfum is made to capture a mysterious and sophisticated journey specifically tailored to an individual's alchemy. With Obsidian, the notes are blended to give a delightful and unforgettable experience. At first smell, one is directly attracted to the burst of Rosemary which adds a fresh touch along with the Saffron which brings a hint of herbal evergreen and earthy note.The floral core of Obsidian is highlighted with the merge between Violet and Rose. Ending the journey is the sensuous blend of Vanilla, Tonka Bean and Cashmere Woods giving a seductive finish that lingers on your skin. Evoke a warm sensation of art and science combined with Obsidian, a fragrance that promises an enchanting and unique journey.

https://www.karjistore.com/alexandre-j-a.title: Alexandre J Art Noveau Butterfly EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/alexandre-j-a.description: The butterfly, a timeless symbol of transformation and freedom, serves as a captivating metaphor for change and growth. This central note symbolizes the blossoming of one’s true self, an elegant evolution of identity.Neroli, with its citrusy and slightly bitter undertones, brings a refreshing twist to the bouquet. Like the vibrant flutter of butterfly wings, this note adds a sense of vibrancy and energy to the fragrance. It’s a reminder that even amidst change, there is an undeniable zest for life and exploration.As these diverse elements come together, they create a harmonious symphony—a multi-faceted floral bouquet that encapsulates both elegance and sophistication. This fragrance mirrors the journey of migrating butterflies, capturing the essence of their vibrant passage across vast landscapes

https://www.karjistore.com/giardini-di-t.title: Giardini Di Toscana Colonia Nobile EDP 100ml

https://www.karjistore.com/giardini-di-t.title: Giardini Di Toscana Bianco Latte EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/giardini-di-t.description: Bianco Latte: the cuddle, the embrace, the pleasure of being wrapped in a cloud of vanilla, milk and honey.

https://www.karjistore.com/khaltat-oud-7.title: Khaltat Oud 7Pcs Gift Set

https://www.karjistore.com/alfred-ritchy.title: Alfred Ritchy Anatolia EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/alfred-ritchy.description:
In the center of Anatolia, present day Turkey, lies a majestic city inviting the world with its beauty and an 
atmosphere full of history and wonder known as Cappadocia. This captivating region is a haven of geological 
marvels and underground cities, where time and nature have created a landscape so surreal in its beauty 
resembling a heavenly dream. 
Alfred Ritchy has chosen Cappadocia as his travel destination due to the many wonders that make this 
location so surreal. One of these wonders is the infamous hot air balloons. As dawn unfolds and the sun 
begins to appear in the orange sky, scores of hot air balloons ascend into the sky, creating a breathtaking 
spectacle that draws visitors from around the globe. For Alfred Ritchy as the balloon was gliding through the 
panoramic sky and at one specific moment, when most people feel submerged with emotions, he picked up 
his notebook and noted down the moment that touched his soul: 5:30 am.
Alfred's inspiration for his new fragrance, Anatolia, was sparked by the ethereal surroundings. This
ancient land, Anatolia, with its historic and geographic significance, is a masterpiece sculpted by 
the hands of time.

https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-soh.title: Atkinsons Soho Gardens Scented Candle 250gm
https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-soh.description: A celebration of London’s liveliest, most exuberant neighbourhood, capturing its buzz and unabashed joie de vivre in a scintillating fusion of floral and fruity ingredients that stimulate the senses and inject a shot of positivity into even the dullest, chilliest day.Bold blackcurrant, green leaves and fragrant freesia evoke the fresh, youthful vibe that pervades the area, while the woody, unconventional tone of guaiac and nuanced mossy hints of oak are a nod to the contemporary, edgy atmosphere that inspired legendary venues such as the seriously cool Soho House.Awaken your senses! This scented candle is a concentration of joy and positivity. Combining floral and fruity flavours with aromatic notes and earthier tones, it oozes effervescence and energy.

https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-gin.title: Atkinsons Gingerbread Deluxe Scented Candle 200gm
https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-gin.description: Nothing says elegance and style like afternoon tea with all the trimmings, so bring out the best china, iron the white linen tablecloth and tempt your honoured guests with tasty titbits artfully arranged on the three-tiered cake stand you’ve been yearning to bring out for a special occasion.Complete the mood with the aroma of Atkinson’s Gingerbread Deluxe, a spectacular combination of ingredients that play off each other to create a peppery, uplifting fragrance. Ginger oil, cinnamon and mandarin deliver spice aplenty, balanced by smoother notes of praline and jasmine and soft, gentle hints of exotic amber and ylang ylang for a scent that will warm the cockles of your (and your guests’) heart.Add a pinch of peppery perfection to your table: this inviting Limited Edition scented candle is a celebration of one of the liveliest yet most delicate of all spices. https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-car.title: Atkinsons Caramel Fever Scented Candle 200gm
https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-car.description: This tribute to caramel is a delectable concentration of all the deliciousness and comfort of Britain’s favourite dessert. Sit back, relax and imagine dipping your spoon into a bowl of melt-in-your mouth, ever-so-slightly spicy pudding, covered in velvety, gooey caramel sauce with perhaps a scoop of ice cream on the side.With subtle layers of amber and delicate traces of wood, combined with buttery, creamy caramel and a soupcon of lively ginger, this is an utterly irresistible candle designed to warm the cockles of the heart on even the chilliest days of the year.Succumb to temptation and enjoy the glorious warmth and comfort of this irresistible scented candle.

https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-a-w.title: Atkinsons A Walk In The Cotswolds Scented Candle 200gm
https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-a-w.description: Soak up the feel-good factor and imagine yourself in a picture-postcard village, strolling along the cobblestones, admiring the adorable thatched cottages and stopping to exclaim at the rambling gardens full of hollyhocks, roses and wisteria.With its base of vanilla, layered with hawthorn and heliotrope, this is an irresistibly soft, velvety fragrance, finished with creamy notes of almond and a touch of elegant musky ambrette that creates an atmosphere as warm and inviting as a traditional pub, complete with log fire and the obligatory Labrador, of course!This earthy sweet but slightly bitter scented candle is as delightfully relaxing as a Sunday afternoon stroll in a typical Cotswold village. https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-amb.title: Atkinsons Amber Glory Scented Candle 200gm
https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-amb.description: Amber Glory is a celebration of the resplendent colours of autumn at that magical moment as day turns to dusk and the red, orange and golden leaves of London’s parks blaze in the glow of the sunset-painted sky.Top notes of geranium and cedar recall the flora of London’s glorious parks and woods, while piquant notes of amber and patchouli, tempered by a touch of sweet vanilla, recreate the cosy warmth that greets you on your return home glowing from a bracing walk, just in time to light the fire and enjoy a final glimpse of twilight’s incredible symphony of colour as the evening closes in.Warm your home and heart alike with its conforting scent that that evokes the magical spectacle of an autumnal sunset.

https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-may.title: Atkinsons Mayfair Opulence Scented Candle 250gm
https://www.karjistore.com/atkinsons-may.description: This glitteringly elegant candle is a beguiling, sophisticated scent inspired by London’s most prestigious district, with a rich, musky heart of amber evoking the opulence and wealth that behoves the most expensive square on the Monopoly board. Soft, seductive notes of vanilla are a nod to the countless trysts and affairs that have played out in the area’s swanky hotels throughout history, while a soupcon of warm, mysterious incense takes us back a century to when Mayfair was home to bohemian yet cultured salons attended by Oscar Wilde and other leading lights of the London Literati. The importance of not being too earnest, indeed.A sensual, sophisticated symphony inspired by the upmarket atmosphere of London’s Mayfair district.

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Oud In White EDP 100ml

https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.title: Laboratorio Olfattivo Amber Bomb EDP 100ml
https://www.karjistore.com/laboratorio-o.description: Power, opulence, creativity, originality, high quality. This is Amberbomb. The very first collaboration between Laboratorio Olfattivo and Arturetto Landi. A fragrance made to impress – able to amaze and fascinate. Amberbomb, with its mix of fruity, floral, dry woody and amber notes, intrigues and seduces. A long-lasting perfume with a great projection. Its vibrant opening with fruity notes is diluted by bitter notes of coffee, which give depth while melting with an enveloping floral heart, composed of powerful flowers such as rose, iris, jasmine and lily of the valley. The warm and sensual notes of amber and vanilla match the earthy, woody notes of patchouli and sandalwood, while leather and nagarmotha provide mystery and seduction. Amberbomb draws attention while leaving a memorable trail.
